main

Class Driver

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.Driver

  • public class Driver
extends java.lang.Object
    Contains the methods responsible for moving the robot.
    Author:
    Scott Sewell

      Constructor.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Driver

        public Driver(Odometer odometer)
        Constructor.

    • Method Detail

      • goForward

        public void goForward(float distance,
             boolean blockThread)
        Begins moving the robot a certain distance. The calling thread is not blocked.
        Parameters:
        distance - the distance that is traveled by the robot in cm.
        blockThread - If true this call returns only after the turn is complete.

      • travelTo

        public void travelTo(Vector2 destination,
            boolean blockThread)
        Begins moving the robot towards a specific position. The calling thread is not blocked.
        Parameters:
        destination - The position to move towards on the board in cm.
        blockThread - If true this call returns only after the turn is complete.

      • turnTo

        public void turnTo(float targetAngle,
          boolean blockThread)
        Turns the robot to face the specified angle. Blocks the calling thread until the action is complete.
        Parameters:
        targetAngle - the world space angle to face in degrees.
        blockThread - If true this call returns only after the turn is complete.

      • turn

        public void turn(float angle,
        int speed,
        boolean blockThread)
        Turns the robot a specific amount relative to the current facing. The thread is blocked until the action is complete.
        Parameters:
        angle - The angle in degrees the robot will turn.
        speed - The speed of rotation.
        blockThread - If true this call returns only after the turn is complete.

      • stop

        public void stop()
        Immediately stops the robot's motion.

      • isTravelling

        public boolean isTravelling()
        Returns:
        true if the robot is still attempting to reach a destination.

      • isNearDestination

        public boolean isNearDestination()
        Returns:
        true if the robot is near to its destination.
